Text: Thanks and Congratulationsfor the presentI really appreciate your thoughtfulness Am going to have it framed and put up some place in the house Heard the great news about Debbie and youmy congratulations As we both know kids make this a special placewish you all the happiness and joy in the world Hope all is well with you and that you had are having a great Holiday Season Bill
